idea:
With Growing Awareness about insurance & with the recent pandemic situation, more & more customers are willing to buy insurance however the traditional way of buying insurance is taking backstep & customers are wanting to have digital mean to search/Understand/buy insurance.
Insurance company relies on Multiple Call centre (In-house/Outsource) to assist customers however with high attrition/Lack of expertise in Call centre management / Ever-evolving technology, create a huge cost for insurance companies to acquire customer online.

Whizkidzz Marketing Pvt Ltd, is an Insurance focused tech-driven outsourcing platform, which enables the insurance company to access readily trained Insurance Tele-sales talent with technology that understands data segmentation & customer profile & also manage customer life cycle management like Post sales Engagement / Claims/retention / Cross-Sell to help reduce Cost of Acquisition/ achieve high conversion & insurance companies can focus more on their core activity of underwriting / Product design.

Also, at whizkidzz, Call centre employees get knowledge of one industry which they typically don't get as they keep switching their jobs for better pay or to pursue further education.

We ensure, the employee with HSC pass qualification or Graduate, Pursue different insurance examination sponsored by the company to understand the Insurance industry in-depth & further make their career in Insurance as Principle officer/ Actuary / Compliance etc. by which we are able to give them one career stream.
name: WHIZKIDZZ MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Planning for an event company which can cater the needs of a middle class family and make their occasion memorable with a minimum profit involved
name: Unlimited Creation Event Company

idea:
PSMPL was established in 2011 by P. Kumar who is an Ex Nautical Surveyor cum DDG Tech, MMD, Haldia, D.G. Shipping, India, Ex. Port State Control Officer, Haldia and Flag State Inspector India. Mr. Kumar is also a Lead Auditor (ISO 9001: 2008) established this organization with an aim to provide Quality ship management services by giving both the owners and the world high standard of service at a reasonable cost.

We are a prominent shipping management industry and cargo service provider. These services are handled by a team of experts. We aim to created a market of customers totally delighted by our services.

Our Services

1. Voyage Monitoring

2. Insurance Arrangements

3. Ship Vetting

4. Vessel Certificates

5. Port Agency

6. Post Fixture Services

7. Auditing of safety & quality management systems (ship & shore).

8. Pre-purchase inspection.

9. Risk management.

10. Occupational health and safety assessment (OHSA).
name: PROACTIVE SHIP MANAGEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Employment generation

SWOOP FUELS SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc. in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter! When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity.
name: SWOOP FUELS SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
